complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the authentication and role management system into subtasks covering: user model/schema design, registration flows for each role, login/logout, password management, role/permission configuration, permission enforcement, admin flows for user management, and comprehensive testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple user roles, complex permission logic, and secure authentication flows. It requires both backend and frontend work, integration with Payload CMS, and thorough testing, making it a high-complexity task. The current subtasks are comprehensive but could be expanded to explicitly cover schema design and edge-case handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: organizer account creation UI, editing/updating organizer details, deactivation/reactivation logic, and permission checks for Superadmin actions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a focused CRUD management task with some permission logic. While not trivial, it is less complex than authentication and can be broken into UI, backend, and permission enforcement subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: event schema/model design, backend CRUD operations, event detail management UI, scheduling logic, status management, and comprehensive testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Event management involves multiple CRUD operations, scheduling, and status logic, requiring both backend and frontend work. The current subtasks are well-structured but could be expanded to include schema/model design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: drag-and-drop UI design, core field type implementation, form persistence, event-form linking, validation logic, advanced field types, and comprehensive testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: A visual form builder is highly complex, involving advanced UI/UX, dynamic data structures, and validation. The task requires careful breakdown to manage complexity and ensure maintainability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: public page template design, dynamic data rendering (event details, countdown, organizer info), and custom URL generation logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a standard dynamic page generation task with moderate complexity, mainly involving frontend work and some backend for URL handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: ticket schema/model, ticket type logic, visibility rules, password/PIN protection, purchase/RSVP flow, inventory management, custom field integration, and comprehensive testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Ticketing involves complex business logic, multiple ticket types, access rules, and integration with forms and events. It requires robust backend and frontend work, as well as thorough testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: event discovery UI, registration UI, dynamic form rendering, ticketing integration, registration submission logic, validation, and end-to-end testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This flow involves multi-step UI, dynamic form rendering, integration with ticketing, and data validation, making it moderately complex and requiring several distinct subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: API integration, verification UI, badge display, error handling, integration with registration flow, and testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While the integration is with a third-party API, it involves both backend and frontend work, error handling, and UI feedback, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: volunteer account creation, assignment to events, credential management, and permission enforcement.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Volunteer management is a CRUD task with some permission logic, similar in complexity to organizer management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: mobile-first UI, QR scanning integration, photo capture, check-in logic, feedback display, device/browser testing, and error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves real-time device features (camera, QR scanning), mobile UI, and integration with ticketing, making it complex and requiring careful breakdown.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: service worker setup, offline data storage, offline check-in logic, sync queue, network detection, conflict resolution, UI feedback, and comprehensive testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Offline support and real-time sync are highly complex, involving advanced browser APIs, data consistency, and conflict resolution, requiring detailed subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: dashboard UI design, live entry widget, sales analytics widget, demographics visualization, data integration, and testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Dashboards require data aggregation, real-time updates, and multiple visualizations, making them moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: ticket list UI, barcode rendering, and ticket detail display.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a standard user portal feature with moderate complexity, mainly involving frontend work.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: barcode generation logic, barcode rendering, validation during check-in, and testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Barcode logic is moderately complex, involving unique code generation, rendering, and validation, but is well-scoped.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: field mapping UI, backend mapping logic, and ticket rendering integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a focused UI and backend integration task with moderate complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: notification trigger definition, in-app notification UI, email integration, user preferences, delivery logic, and testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Notifications involve multiple delivery channels, user preferences, and integration with key flows, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: secure data storage, HTTPS enforcement, security headers, input validation, privacy policy, security audit, and penetration testing planning.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Security and privacy require multiple layers of implementation and verification, including compliance, making this a high-complexity task.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: metrics definition, data collection logic, dashboard UI, and data validation/testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Analytics involves backend data aggregation and frontend visualization, with moderate complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: settings UI, backend configuration logic, and feature toggle management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a standard admin interface task with moderate complexity, mainly involving CRUD and configuration logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: volunteer account creation, event assignment, permission management, and UI for organizers.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a CRUD and permission management task, similar in complexity to other user management features.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand into subtasks for: Storybook installation, configuration (addons, Tailwind), and sample component/story creation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Setting up Storybook is a well-documented, low-complexity task, mainly involving installation and configuration.
